Class _RightsAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.engiweb.profilemanager.common.ruleengine.action.reorganize._RightsAction

extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to manage 'Rights' entities through Drools rules engine

                                           java.lang.String key,
                                           java.lang.String value)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        The method deletes the record identified by the given couple from the Service Attribute Lookup table.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        key - name of the service attribute, mandatory
        value - value to add to the lookup values of the service attribute given, mandatory
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • insertServiceAttrLookup

        public static void insertServiceAttrLookup(DAO sql,
                                           java.lang.String key,
                                           java.lang.String value)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        The method inserts a record into the Service Attribute Lookup table. It checks if there is already a record with the same values, in negative case the couple is inserted.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        key - name of the service attribute, mandatory
        value - value to add to the lookup values of the service attribute given, mandatory
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • insertEntitlementRights

        public static void insertEntitlementRights(DAO sql,
                                           EntitlementBean entitlementBean,
                                           <any> eServList)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        The method adds a Beanlist of rights to the entitlement given. When a permission with rights associated is assigned to the entitlement, it is possible to give values for the rights associated to the entitlement. These values can be either value_type FIXED (users will inherit the values automatically) or value_type RESTRICT LOOKUP (these values are filtered by serviceLookup values for this right, restricting the possible choices).
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        entitlementBean - entitlement target of the assignment of rights, mandatory and defined uniquely
        eServList - rights to associate to the entitlement, mandatory
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • deleteEntitlementRights

        public static void deleteEntitlementRights(DAO sql,
                                           EntitlementBean entitlementBean,
                                           ServiceAttributeBean sab)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        The method deletes the entitlement right identified by the couple .
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        entitlementBean - entitlement filter, mandatory and defined uniquely
        sab - service filter, mandatory
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        public static <any> findEntitlementRightsValues(DAO sql,
                                                EntitlementBean entitlementBean,
                                                ServiceAttributeBean sab,
                                                Paging paging)
                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the entitlement rights according to the filters given.

        sab - right attribute filter
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of entitlement rights found
        Throws:

      • findUserPermissionsWithRights

        public static <any> findUserPermissionsWithRights(DAO sql,
                                                  UserBean userBean,
                                                  EntitlementBean permission,
                                                  Paging paging)
                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the user permissions with valorized rights. It is possible to filter by user.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        userBean - user filter
        permission - permission filter, mandatory and defined uniquely
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of permissions found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findPermissionRights

        public static <any> findPermissionRights(DAO sql,
                                         ServiceAttributeBean serviceAttributeBean,
                                         EntitlementBean permission,
                                         Paging paging)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the right attributes associated to the permission given. It is possible to filter by right attribute.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        serviceAttributeBean - right attribute filter
        permission - permission filter, mandatory, defined uniquely and it must be a permission
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of right attributes found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findPermissionRights

        public static <any> findPermissionRights(DAO sql,
                                         ServiceAttributeBean serviceAttributeBean,
                                         EntitlementBean permission,
                                         EntitlementBean parentEntitlement,
                                         Paging paging)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the right attributes associated to the permission given. The list also contains, for each right attribute, information about the type of entitlement service associated to the parent entitlement. It is possible to filter by right attribute.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        serviceAttributeBean - right attribute filter
        permission - permission filter, mandatory, defined uniquely and it must be a permission
        parentEntitlement - parent entitlement filter, mandatory and defined uniquely
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of right attributes found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findUserRights

        public static <any> findUserRights(DAO sql,
                                   ServiceAttributeBean serviceAttributeBean,
                                   EntitlementBean permission,
                                   UserBean userBean,
                                   Paging paging)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing all right attributes of the user given. It is possible to filter by right attribute and entitlement. If the EntitlementBean parameter is not null than you will obtain as result all the user's right attributes connected to the given entitlement. If used, the entitlement has to be a permission and uniquely defined.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        serviceAttributeBean - right attribute filter
        permission - permission filter, if used it must be a permission and defined uniquely
        userBean - user filter, mandatory and defined uniquely
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of right attributes found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findUserRights

        public static <any> findUserRights(DAO sql,
                                   ServiceAttributeBean serviceAttributeBean,
                                   PwdCfgBean pwdCfgBean,
                                   UserBean userBean,
                                   Paging paging)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing all right attributes of the user given. It is possible to filter by right attribute and configuration. If the PwdCfgBean parameter is not null than you will obtain as result all the user's right attributes of the entitlements connected to the given configuration. If used, the configuration has to be defined uniquely.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        serviceAttributeBean - right attribute filter
        pwdCfgBean - configuration filter, if used it must be defined uniquely
        userBean - user filter, mandatory and defined uniquely
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of right attributes found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • checkService

        public static java.util.HashMap<EntitlementBean,<any>> checkService(DAO sql,
                                                                    UserBean userBean,
                                                                    <any> entBeanBL)
                                                             throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a map containing the given entitlements as keyset and the right attributes associated to them as valueset. If the user provided is not null, for each entitlement it checks if there are valorized right attributes associated to the user and, eventually, it adds them to the corresponding list of right attributes.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        userBean - user filter
        entBeanBL - list of entitlements to check
        Returns:
        map of entitlements and right attributes associated to them
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findRightAttrLookup

        public static <any> findRightAttrLookup(DAO sql,
                                        java.lang.String key,
                                        ServiceAttributeBean sab,
                                        Paging paging)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the right attribute lookup values of the right attribute identified by the string key provided and, eventually, by the right attribute filter given.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        key - right attribute key
        sab - right attribute filter
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of lookup right attributes found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

                                       <any> rightsList)

        public static void insertOrUpdateRight(DAO sql,
                                       UserBean userBean,
                                       <any> rightsList)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        The method updates all user attributes. Substitute the attributes keys and values with the list provided for the given user.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        userBean - user target of the operation, mandatory and defined uniquely
        rightsList - list of rights to add/update, mandatory
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • insertOrUpdateRight

        public static void insertOrUpdateRight(DAO sql,
                                       PwdCfgBean pwdCfgBean,
                                       UserBean userBean,
                                       <any> rightsList)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        The method updates all user attributes. Substitute the attributes keys and values with the list provided on the given configuration of the given user.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        pwdCfgBean - configuration filter, mandatory
        userBean - user target of the operation, mandatory and defined uniquely
        rightsList - list of rights to add/update, mandatory
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
